be.ac.umons.model.hexagon

Class SpecificBridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.umons.model.hexagon.Hexagon
      • be.ac.umons.model.hexagon.Bridge
        • be.ac.umons.model.hexagon.SpecificBridge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class SpecificBridge
extends Bridge
    Hexagon that contains two or three bridges which let pass lasers of a specific color
    See Also:
